borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of privacy to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies&nbsp; DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>

<div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed development by reason of excessive&nbsp;massing results in a bulky appearance which is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area.&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies&nbsp;SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);&nbsp;</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension.
